name: Simple Cron
author: MyWebsiteAdvisor

sections.description:
Simple Cron Plugin for WordPress is a tool to Manage and Monitor WordPress Cron Scheduling System

Developer Website: http://MyWebsiteAdvisor.com/

Plugin Page: http://MyWebsiteAdvisor.com/tools/wordpress-plugins/simple-cron/

We are looking for testimonials and live examples of our plugins on your website!
Please submit your website or testimonial here: http://MyWebsiteAdvisor.com/testimonials/
If we choose your testimonial or website we can link to your site and generate some free traffic for you!

Requirements:

  • PHP 5.3

To-do:
sections.installation:
1. Upload simple-cron/ to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to Simple Cron Plugin settings and enable Simple Cron Plugin.
sections.faq:
Plugin doesn’t work …

Please specify as much information as you can to help us debug the problem.
Check in your error.log if you can.
Please send screenshots as well as a detailed description of the problem.

sections.changelog:
1.1

  • resolved several issues causing notices in debug.log
  • fixed typos in plugin help menu
  • changed display of scheduled time to show local time and date

1.0.1

  • added check for PHP v5.3 due to the use of anonymous php functions

1.0

  • Initial release
